DOC.brief_summary: FL3X integrate diabetes self-management system incorporate modern cell phone technology behavioral modification approach improve diabetes self-management high-risk youth . Utilizing approaches increase adherence diabetes management behavior improve glucose control provide increase autonomy diabetes care .
DOC.brief_title: Study A Cell-Phone System Improve Health Youth With Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: FL3X utilize diabetes care provider ( diabetes educator ) health coach employ behavioral modification technique include motivational interviewing problem solve skill train . Coaches help adolescent family learn technique improve diabetes self management behavior diabetes care .
DOC.criteria: type 1 diabetes duration least 12 month age 1216 year registration poor glycemic control ( A1c 8.013.0 % ) parent/guardian willing also participate minority race/ethnicity low income pregnant ( female ) diabetes type 2 gestational health insurance Preexisting systemic chronic disease ( drug abuse , cancer , psychiatric condition )
